Bro. Gage has been the object of the great love and condescension of Christ, and yet he has never felt that he could imitate 
                                                                           39
the great Exemplar. He claims, and all his life has sought after, a better portion in this life than was given our Lord. Bro. Gage has never felt the depths of ignorance and sin from which Christ has proposed to lift him, and to link him to his divine nature.
